mean_cn: n. 部分；片段；（橘子等的）瓣
mean_en: a part of something that is separate from the other parts or can be considered separately
word_etyma: seg切 + ment名词后缀 → segment 部分，切片
sentence: Our company dominates a small segment of the market.
sentence_trans: 我们公司占有了一小部分市场。
sentence_phrase: a small segment of the market
